Steps.Text: Install the FastReport designer (the designer can be downloaded from the "Documentation" section in the {parameter:AcademyLink}).

Steps: Specify the report data source.
Implement the logic for processing report data in Creatio configuration.
Download file with the data source and open it in the FastReport Designer.
Design the report in the FastReport Designer.
Save the report file and upload it to Creatio.

Steps.Text: Instale o designer FastReport (o designer pode ser baixado da seção "Documentação" no {parâmetro: AcademyLink}).

Steps: Especifique a fonte de dados do relatório.
Implemente a lógica para processar dados de relatório na configuração do Creatio.
Baixe o arquivo com a fonte de dados e abra-o no FastReport Designer.
Desenho o relatório no FastReport Designer.
Guarde o arquivo de relatório e carregue-o no Creatio.

Custom.Caption: Especifique as fontes de dados para o relatório

Description.Text: Configure os dados do relatório para adicionar dados do Creatio ao seu relatório. Indique a lista de objetos, as suas colunas, os links em formato json. Exemplos de descrições de fontes de dados estão disponíveis em {parâmetro: AcademyLink}.

Download.Caption: Download file with data sources to design a report in the FastReport Designer
Download.Description: Open the downloaded file in the FastReport Designer and set up the report layout. The downloaded file will contain the data source structure that you can use in the FastReport Designer.

Upload.Caption: Import a file with the report template
Upload.Description: After you import the .frx file, the report will appear in the “Print” menu of the section or on the record page as per the report settings.

For production usage please consider switching to modern OAuth authentication. Configuration instructions are available in Creatio Academy.

SchemaDataDesignerPage.InfoBlockText2: The installation type determines the method of adding the application data upon the installation of the package.
SchemaDataDesignerPage.InfoBlockText3: • Installation - the data is added on the first installation of the package and is updated along with the package updates. This is the most versatile type and is used by default.
SchemaDataDesignerPage.InfoBlockText4: • Update existing - the data is added during the first installation of the package. Updating the package modifies only the data in the columns where the “Forced update” checkbox is selected on the “Column setup” tab. Use this type to deliver “hotfix” updates and other similar cases.
SchemaDataDesignerPage.InfoBlockText5: • Initial installation - the data is added only on the first installation of the package. This type is enabled only when installing packages via the WorkspaceConsole utility. Using “Initial installation” is generally not recommended.

ColumnsDetail.Title: Columns setting
ColumnsDetail.Blankslate: Select an object, then set up the columns
ColumnsDetail.ErrorDeletePrimaryColumn: Deleting the primary column "{0}" is forbidden

Tooltips.ForcedUpdate: The checkbox indicates that the data in this column will update whenever the corresponding package is updated. This checkbox is used for the “Update existing” data installation type only.
Tooltips.Key: The checkbox is set for the object's primary column by default. If the database uses composite keys, select this checkbox for all composite key columns. An object's primary column cannot be a composite key column.

PackagePage.InstallBehaviorInfo: The package is installed on the environment and activated automatically when all its dependencies are available. Missing dependencies do not interfere with the installation of the package/application that includes the package. Once all dependencies are available, the package is automatically activated and becomes accessible to the user. If the dependencies are no longer available, the package is automatically deactivated.

Notes.Text:
Url para obter oportunidades – uma URL de Creatio que receberá as ligações das contas de anúncios conectadas. O site he Creatio tem de estar acessível para poder receber as solicitações recebidas. Se você usar um servidor proxy, especifique a URL do proxy em vez da URL de Creatio. Se sua instância de Creatio é parte de uma rede de acesso restrita, lista branca os IPs do serviço de geração de chumbo.

Função para receber notificações - Creatio irá notificar os usuários dentro desta função em caso de qualquer falha, tais como erros ao conectar contas de anúncios ou criar leads.

A guia "Conexão" exibe a lista de contas de anúncios e páginas conectadas ao Creatio. A lista inclui os status de conexão atuais na página, conta e níveis de token. Você pode gerenciar as conexões, por exemplo, excluir ou redefiní-las.

A aba "Logs" exibe o log de alterações de funcionalidade de geração de leads.

IntegrationSettings.AutorouteMessage: Para prosseguir com o trabalho, você deve preencher o campo "Url para obter leads". Por padrão, o campo foi preenchido com o endereço atual do navegador da aplicação. Certifique-se de que você digitou o endereço correto da aplicação e salve as configurações. Essas configurações são feitas uma vez quando você abre a turma pela primeira vez.

Error.FormValidation: Error when trying to save the settings. Please check all fields for any errors.
Error.Save: Failed to save the value entered in the "Url to get leads" field. Make sure to enter the correct, externally accessible address for the application.

Logs.GetIntegrationListError: Failure has occurred while loading list of integrations. Loading has been aborted.
Logs.NoLogsMessage: There are currently no logs to display

AdAccountsTable.DeleteError: Esta conta de anúncio está conectada a uma integração. Exclua a integração e tente novamente

ConnectionStatusErrorMessage.Inactive: Unable to access the ad account. Sign in to LinkedIn and set up permissions to accounts you need to integrate.

UsersTable.DeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the token? This may cause issues with ad account access and lead retrieval

TokenStatusErrorMessage.Expired: Sign in to LinkedIn and grant permissions to ad accounts on behalf of the user whose token expired.
TokenStatusErrorMessage.Revoked:
The token was revoked.
Possible reasons:
- This account was used to log in to a different Creatio instance.
- The lead generation app was disconnected on LinkedIn’s end.
To resolve this issue, sign in to LinkedIn one more time and grant permissions to ad accounts on behalf of the user whose token was revoked.
TokenStatusErrorMessage.Unknown: Unable to retrieve the token status due to one or more errors during the request. Please refresh the page.

IntegrationSection.DeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this integration? Creatio will not be able to retrieve new leads from it
IntegrationSection.DeleteError: Unable to delete the integration, access to ad account denied. Grant access to the corresponding ad account and try again

BlankSlate.Description: You don't have any integrations configured.

Error.FormSelection: Unable to modify settings. Make sure the required object fields are mapped and the "Unmapped form fields" macro settings are specified.

Detail.Name: Nome
Detail.DeactivateConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to deactivate your subscription? Lead transfer from all forms will be stopped. The new status will take effect after the changes are saved at the integration card level.

InfoBlock.Title: Nota
InfoBlock.Text: All forms for the selected page are connected to the Creatio. Make the default settings for all forms on the "Default Settings" tab. Unique settingsfor each form can be made on the "Forms" tab.

ColumnMapping.Hint:
Creatio applies the default mapping to all ad account forms.
The settings only apply to the form columns with the user profile information.
You can map custom questions, custom checkboxes, and hidden fields on the form record page. Select the “Custom mapping” checkbox to enable this feature.
“Not mapped fields” macro lets you pass the values of all columns to a single object column.

Logs.NoLogsForIntegrationMessage: Não existem logs para esta integração

FormsList.Hint:
Custom mapping settings override the default mapping settings. Map each form separately.
If you deactivate custom mapping, Creatio will apply the default mapping settings to the form.

BlankSlate.Description: For this form the default mapping settings are applied.

FormsList.DeactivateFormConfirmationQuestion: Are you sure you want to unsubscribe from receiving leads from this form in Creatio? The new status will take effect after the changes are saved at the integration card level.

IntegrationSyncInfo.UnableToAdAccountAccess: Não foi possível aceder à conta. A sincronização do Lead parou.
IntegrationSyncInfo.SaveIntegration: Please save the integration and refresh the page to receive notifications on the status of lead sync.
IntegrationSyncInfo.SubscriptionInactive: Lead subscription is inactive for the selected ad account. Lead sync has been stopped. Subscription activation will restore the receipt of leads in Creatio.
IntegrationSyncInfo.SubscriptionActive: Lead subscription is active for the selected ad account. Leads created on the LinkedIn side will be transferred to Creatio.

ForForm.ModalBoxTitle: Click “Sync” to upload the form’s leads for the period. The period is calculated regardless of the form’s lead subscription status at the time.

ForAdAccount.ModalBoxTitle: Clique em "Sincronizar" para carregar os leads da conta para o período. O período é calculado independentemente do status de assinatura lead da conta no momento. Creatio não irá refazer o upload de leads que já tiver sincronizado.

ModalBox.SuccessRunBusinessProcessInfoText: The lead upload process started. It may take some time until the process is finished.
ModalBox.UnknownFailedRunBusinessProcessInfoText: Failed to start the lead upload process. Please try again later. If the startup error persists, contact technical support.

IntegrationError.ServerUrlEmpty: Unable to connect to the lead generation service. The following system settings are empty: “Identity server URL”, “Identity server client id”, “Identity server client secret”.
IntegrationError.InvalidScope: Unable to connect to the lead generation service. The lead generation service’s user account lacks essential permissions. Please contact Creatio support to fix this issue.
IntegrationError.InvalidClient: Unable to connect to the lead generation service. Unexpected values in the “Identity server client id” and “Identity server client secret” system settings. Please contact Creatio support to fix this issue.
IntegrationError.ServerUnavailable: Unable to connect to the lead generation service. Please refresh the page or contact Creatio support if the problem persists.
IntegrationError.InvalidSettings: Unable to connect to the lead generation service. The following system settings are empty: “Identity server URL”, “Identity server client id”, “Identity server client secret”.
IntegrationError.GeneralError: Unable to connect to the lead generation service. Please refresh the page or contact Creatio support if the problem persists.

Attachment.Hint: The Attachments component includes a file list, an expandable group, an upload file button, a refresh button. Recommended to use on a form page to display related attachments.
